name: Fibonacci iterator
description:
Contruct a unlimited generator of fibonacci sequence.

The Fibonacci serie is a sequence  in which each number is the sum of the two preceding ones at the form:

* F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2)
* which F(1) an F(2) are fixed values.

More info [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fibonacci_number)

The generator must be a implementation of an Iterable one. The implemented method must return an Iterable intance.

In construction the iterator you must give the F(1) and F(2) values.


Performance ir relevant, the test ask for iterative sequences over 10^6 values. Use a predefined list donÂ´t work here.

In order to can take this sizes, the values returned must be implementation of large integer formats.
